message.content:
cs.CR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.SE 

This paper deals with the vulnerability of learning-based systems to adversarial attacks, specifically in the context of PDF malware detection. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also proposes a scoring mechanism and an evasion method, which involves machine learning techniques, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) likely categories as well. The paper also involves image processing techniques, which could place it in the cs.CV (Computer Vision) category. Finally, the paper evaluates the proposed approaches through experimental evaluations, which could place it in the cs.SE (Software Engineering) category.
